## EntityEventPayloads."ENTITY.START\_MODEL\_LOOPED\_ANIMATIONS" property

Emitted when the looped animations of the entity's model are started.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[EntityEvent.START_MODEL_LOOPED_ANIMATIONS]: {
        entity: Entity;
        animations: Set<string>;
    };
```
